text.jpText:
URA賞短距離部門の最優秀賞を手にした
タイキシャトル。だが“年度代表ウマ娘”に
選ばれたのは、エアグルーヴだった。
text.enText:
Taikishattle won the URA Award for Best 
Short-distance Horse. However, the winner 
of the "Horse of the Year" award However, 
the winner of the "Horse of the Year" 
award was Airgroove.

text.jpText:
しかし、タイキシャトルはめげなかった。
トレーナーが信じた脚の速さを誇りに次こそ
“年度代表ウマ娘”になるのだと豪語する。
text.enText:
However, Taiki Shattle was not discouraged. 
Proud of the speed of her legs, which her 
trainer believed in, she is determined to be 
the "Horse of the Year" next time. She is 
proud of the speed of her legs, which her 
trainer believed in, and says that she will 
be the "Horse of the Year" next time.

text.jpText:
そのために出走するＧⅠレース全てに勝利し、
多くの人に彼女のスピードとパワーの凄さを
刻み付けると誓う。
text.enText:
She has vowed to win all the G1 races she 
runs for that purpose, and to impress many 
people with her speed and power. the speed 
and power of her.

text.jpText:
……決意を新たにした2人は、手始めに
春のマイル王を決める『安田記念』への
出走を決意するのだった！
text.enText:
……The two, with renewed determination, 
decide to run in the "Yasuda Kinen" to 
decide the king of the mile in the spring 
for starters. The first step was to run 
in the "Yasuda Kinen," the spring race 
to decide the king of the mile!
